tasks.title: System Integration & Permissions Layer
tasks.description: Implement a secure, pluggable system integration layer that allows the assistant to run shell commands, access files/folders, launch and control installed programs, and integrate with external services (calendar, email, browser). Must request and log explicit user permissions for each new tool or integration. Provide a YAML configuration for allow/deny rules and an escalation prompt when new actions are attempted.

tasks.title: Learning & Skills Framework
tasks.description:
Design and implement a framework for the assistant to grow and learn over time. It should:
- Save interaction history and outcomes to local memory for retrieval and adaptation.
- Support pluggable 'skills' (scripts or modules) that can be added, updated, or removed.
- Track user preferences (voices, commands, workflows) and use them to auto-suggest actions.
- Include developer docs on how to add new skills safely.
